attributes.action: Renew the UK's commitment to saving child refugees through the Dubs Amendment
attributes.background:
The UK government is ending its commitment to save lone child refugees after only taking 350. This reversal leaves thousands of vulnerable children in jeopardy.

The government must renew its commitment to the amendment, and offer safety to the endangered children who desperately need it.

rejection.details:
The following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/183943
